turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's closest to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please provide your city and state and i'll find the store closest to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sacramento, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, are you close to natomas marketplace?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caffe americano to be picked up at the starbucks at naotmas marketplace.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
